author: Josh Gerstein
title: Paul Manafort seeking release from prison due to coronavirus threat
description: His attorney argues the former Trump campaign manager is at “high risk.”
content: Mr. Manafort is at a high risk of contracting COVID-19 at FCI Loretto due to his age and pre-existing health conditions, and it is imperative that Mr. Manafort be transferred to home confinement immediately in order to minimize the likelihood of Mr. Manafort … [+5438 chars]
